completion.item: <[!CDATA[Activates an itemParameters: gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the new item to be activatedThrows: TypeError - if the item is not a ListItem ]]>
<[!CDATA[Adds an item to the tree. This is automatically done by instantiating a new item.Parameters: gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the new item to be addedThrows: - ]]>

<[!CDATA[Key Event Handler for the TreeParameters:
Event  -  W3C-Event
				]]>
<[!CDATA[Notifies all selection listeners about the selection change ]]>

<[!CDATA[Selects a specific itemParameters: gara.jswt.TreeItem item - the item to selectboolean _add - true for adding to the current selection, false will select only this itemThrows: TypeError - if the item is not a TreeItem ]]>
<[!CDATA[Selects a Range of items. From shiftItem to the passed item. ]]>

<[!CDATA[Update ItemsParameters:
gara.jswt.TreeItem[] items - to updateHTMLElement parentNode - the parent dom node
				]]>

<[!CDATA[Event Handler for the treeParameters:
Event  -  W3C-event
				]]>
<[!CDATA[Register listeners for this widget. Implementation for gara.jswt.Widget ]]>
